item.title: Human Transcription Discount Coupon
item.description: For those who need a human touch, we offer a discount for human transcription services. The service is not given by us, thus we cannot be responsible for it - but we do offer a discount for it for Speechnotes users, and never heard any issues with it. So, we fill comfortable referring to them - and getting you - our users - probably the best price on the market for human transcriptions.
